Liverpool cruised past Wolves 4-0 to pull even on points with Premier League leaders Tottenham on Sunday.
The win gives Jurgen Klopp's men 24 points from 11 matches, same as Spurs who beat Arsenal 2… [+1100 chars]

articles.title: Why Steve Smith was overlooked for Australian captaincy - SEN
articles.description: Matthew Wade skippered Australia in the second T20I against India on Sunday.
articles.content:
Justin Langer says Steve Smith is doing all the right things in showing leadership despite being overlooked for the national captaincy in Sundays T20I against India.

articles.author: Bret Harris
articles.title: Hollow Test season spells end of Dave Rennie's Wallabies honeymoon - The Guardian
articles.description: What started with a moral victory ended in bitter disappointment after another season of false dawns
articles.content:
The honeymoon is over for Dave Rennie, who is now the only Wallabies coach in the professional era to win just one Test in his first calendar year in the job.
After losing the Bledisloe Cup for the … [+4581 chars]
